name: World Between Worlds
description:
Background

In the World Between Worlds, green rabbits need to be saved from the red foxes. The purple robot rescues the green rabbits and needs to avoid the red foxes. 

World Between Worlds was created for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

What is the object of the game?

The object of the game is to collect all the green rabbits. 

How do you win?

You win by collecting all the green rabbits.

How do you lose?

You lose by getting caught by the red foxes.

How do I play? 

To move using the keyboard:

  • W or up arrow - Up
  • S or down arrow - Down
  • A or left arrow - Left
  • D or right arrow - Right

To move using the PS4 controller:

  • Triangle - Up
  • X - Down
  • Square - Left
  • Circle - Right

Speed is determined by the number of times you press the key or button. Each time you press a key or button, the character will move in that direction. The more times you press the key or button, the faster the character will move. 

Notes

  • Developed using Bolt visual scripting and Unity.
  • The file includes the following that can be used as examples for other projects:
    • Keyboard and PS4 controllers
    • Simple collision system for the hero, rabbits, and foxes
    • Audio soundtrack
    • Character prefabs
